name: Flex Slider for WP Rotator
author: Chris Bratlien, Bill Erickson

sections.description:
WP Rotator is a powerful and customizable rotator plugin for WordPress. This plugin extends it, replacing the default javascript and markup with that of FlexSlider, so that it will scale down with your website on smaller screens (assuming your design scales down as well).

You must have the WP Rotator plugin installed for this to work.
sections.installation:
1. Upload wp-rotator to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Upload flex-slider-for-wp-rotator to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  3. Activate both plugins through the Plugins menu in WordPress.
  4. Go to Settings > WP Rotator to configure
sections.changelog:
**Version 1.1 **
* Upgraded FlexSlider to 1.7
* Fixed some bugs where the navigation icons didn’t display in the right place
* Prevent plugin from activating if WP Rotator isn’t already installed. props pauldewouters

**Version 1.0 **

  • This is version 1.0. Everything’s new!

short_description: Turns WP Rotator into FlexSlider, a fully responsive jQuery slider.
